attributes.action: ban jump horse racing to help reduce unnecessary horse deaths and jockey injuries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Horse racing which involves horses having to jump obstacles, such as fences or hedges, and frequently fall to injury and/or their deaths should be banned in a civilised society. It is cruel to the horses and also to those riding them as they can be trampled on when they fall off the horse.
